text: Gūzō o sūhai suru mono-tachi wa iu. `Moshi arrā ga o nozominara, watashi-tachi mo mata watashi-tachi no sosen mo, kare o sashioite nanimono ni mo tsukaenakattadearou. Mata watashi-tachi wa kare (no meirei) naku, nanimono o mo kinjinakattadearou.' Kare-ra izen no mono-tachi mo sōdeatta. Tsumari shito-tachi (no tsutome) wa, meihakuna (keiji no) senpu no soto ni nani ga arou ka
